mapper.select: /* CreditMapper.getCreditMemberList */ SELECT tsspc.STORE_CD, (SELECT STORE_NM FROM TB_MS_STORE WHERE HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND STORE_CD = tsspc.STORE_CD) AS STORE_NM, tsspc.SALE_DATE, tsspc.MEMBR_NO, (SELECT MEMBR_NM FROM TB_MB_MEMBER WHERE HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND MEMBR_NO = tsspc.MEMBR_NO) AS MEMBR_NM, tsspc.SALE_AMT, 0 AS CREDIT_AMT, '' AS CREDIT_IN_FG FROM TB_SL_SALE_PAY_CREDIT tsspc UNION SELECT tmmc.STORE_CD, (SELECT STORE_NM FROM TB_MS_STORE WHERE HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND STORE_CD = tmmc.STORE_CD) AS STORE_CD, tmmc.SALE_DATE, tmmc.MEMBR_NO, (SELECT MEMBR_NM FROM TB_MB_MEMBER WHERE HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND MEMBR_NO = tmmc.MEMBR_NO) AS MEMBR_NM, 0 AS SALE_AMT, tmmc.CREDIT_AMT, tmmc.CREDIT_IN_FG FROM TB_MB_MEMBER_CREDIT tmmc ORDER BY STORE_CD, SALE_DATE
